name: Trebuchet Town
storyline: You're the new Mayor in town, and you will build an amazing city using your trusty Trebuchet! Balance your population, industry, power, and leisure. Good luck on your quest to make Trebuchet Town the best it can be! Aim and Power your Trebuchet like a classic flinging game, while managing your town in city builder style.
summary: It's a city management game mixed with a trebuchet physics game, oh the horror!
